Define Documentation

#define LOGA ( X,
STRING   )     RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().logAssert(__FILE__,TOSTRING(__LINE__),X,STRING );

An Assertion macro for Logger.

The define's based macro LOGA provides an assertion : the STRING message will be log with II loglevel if X is true, otherwise the loglevel will be EE. AA will be placed in the beginning of the logged message to marked it like an assertion.

Parameters:
X a boolean expression to be tested
STRING the assertion message
See Logger class for more informations.

A Error macro for Logger.

The define's based macro LOGE provides a error log. STRING message will be log with EE loglevel.

Parameters:
STRING the error message
See Logger class for more informations.
